abstract: Terra Firma’s trial in its lawsuit against Citigroup, which contends that the bank misled the private equity firm in its buyout of EMI, got under way in a federal court in Manhattan.
snippet: Terra Firma’s trial in its lawsuit against Citigroup, which contends that the bank misled the private equity firm in its buyout of EMI, got under way in a federal court in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: When the British financier Guy Hands, pictured, was devising plans to buy the EMI Group in 2007, he and his firm, Terra Firma, gave the deal the secret code name “Project Dice.”

headline.main: Citigroup and Terra Firma Clash at Trial
